structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Liability for failure to discontinue service.
law.text: Any water supplier which wrongfully fails or refuses to discontinue water service pursuant to an order properly made to it by a sewer body and continues such failure or refusal for a period of thirty (30) days after receipt of the notice, shall be liable to the sewer body for any amount due from the sewer user involved.
law.history: Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 170, sec. 9, effective June 19, 1958.
